thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Andrew

author: Andrew
title: Andrew
text:
I buy almost everything that I need online for the past 8 to 10 years. Had some bad experiences. Then I found Banggood and did not expect much difference. To my surprise I, as a customer am really king. The merchandise and prices are outstanding and they really stand behind their products. Customer service is nothing less than superb.
I highly recommend Banggood for those who want to shop online with peace of mind.
I have nothing bad to say about Banggood.
